price: Esses são os que Allah amaldiçoou. E para quem Allah amaldiçoa, não lhe encontrarás socorredor algum.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُۖ وَمَن يَلۡعَنِ ٱللَّهُ فَلَن تَجِدَ لَهُۥ نَصِيرًا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna laʿanahumu al-lahu waman yalʿani al-lahu falan tajida lahu naṣīran
